d <- data.frame(longitude, latitude, id)

library("ggplot2")
library("sf")
library("rnaturalearth")
library("rnaturalearthdata")

world <- ne_countries(scale = "medium", returnclass = "sf")
class(world)

d$longitude <- as.numeric(d$longitude)
d$latitude <- as.numeric(d$latitude)

colors <- c("#FFE100", "#0075DC", "#993F00", "#4C005C", "#191919", 
        "#005C31", "#2BCE48", "#FFCC99", "#808080", "#94FFB5", 
        "#8F7C00", "#9DCC00", "#C20088", "#003380", "#FFA405", 
        "#FFA8BB", "#426600", "#FF0010", "#5EF1F2", "#00998F", 
        "#E0FF66", "#740AFF", "#990000", "#FFFF80", "#FFE100", 
        "#FF5005")

ggplot(data = world) +
  geom_sf(fill="antiquewhite", color="grey49") +
  xlab("Longitude") + ylab("Latitude") +
  geom_jitter(data=d , aes(longitude,latitude, color=id), 
              shape = 10,  fill = "white",size = 4, 
              stroke = 1,width = 0.2, height = 3)+ 
  theme(panel.grid.major = element_line(color = gray(.5), 
                                        linetype = "dashed", size = 0), panel.background = element_rect(fill = "aliceblue"))+
  xlab("")+ylab("")+
  coord_sf(expand = FALSE)+
  theme(axis.text.x=element_blank(), #remove x axis labels
        axis.ticks.x=element_blank(), #remove x axis ticks
        axis.text.y=element_blank(),  #remove y axis labels
        axis.ticks.y=element_blank()  #remove y axis ticks
  ) +   scale_colour_manual(
    values = colors)
